channel.title: Data Science Exploration
channel.description: Recent content on Data Science Exploration

item.title: What is a name? Intro to Long Short Term Networks
item.description: Today I want to talk about names. Mine has been around since the Old Testament, but recently celebrities have been getting pretty creative with what they call their kids. A few weeks ago, my team was assigned a project parsing resumes for new hires, and when I realized that some students actually don’t put their name at the top of the page, I thought this would be an interesting problem to solve using a neural net.
